name: Ted's Phobias
description:
This is a game about a rock climber who  is trying to get home to his house.

This is a game about phobias, and the ones in this game are...

arachnophobia, claustrophobia, Ornithophobia, Aichmophobia, speluncaphobia,Acrophobia, basophobia, and Much more!

I hope you enjoy this short game!

Controls, left and right arrow keys to move, space bar to jump, and spam space bar to climb walls!
